sentences.sContent: We should all make contributions to the modernization of our country.
sentences.sContent_eng: We should all make contributions to the modernization of our country.
sentences.sCn: 我们都应该对我国的现代化作出贡献。

sentences.sContent: I believe the children we help today will be well educated, which will contribute a lot to the modernization of our country.
sentences.sContent_eng: I believe the children we help today will be well educated, which will contribute a lot to the modernization of our country.
sentences.sCn: 我相信，我们今天帮助的孩子们会受到良好的教育， 而这将对我国的现代化作出巨大的贡献。

words.tran: 现代的，现代化的；现代派的，现代主义的
现代性；现代的东西；新式
现代主义；现代思想；现代作风
现代主义者；现代主义艺术家
